column2: a very solid choice for dinner. I'd probably come back to try some of the other sandwiches or the other breakfast items. Their breakfast menu looked amazing. I'd recommend this place
column3: especially for its creative and interesting menu. There's something for everyone. With West Loop
column4: restaurants can really come and go
column5: but Little Goat has been around for a while and I think it's become a staple in the neighborhood.
